user.title: Select Login Type
user.description: Choose whether to log in with an email address or phone number.

login_data.title: Enter Login Details
login_data.description: Enter your login details. If logging in with a phone number, select the country code.

email.description: Enter your email and password along with the region.

phone.description: Enter your phone number, country code, password, and region.

select_vehicle.title: Select Vehicle
select_vehicle.description: Select the VIN of the vehicle you want to add.

error.auth: Authentication failed, please check your credentials.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
